title: Azamara Club Cruises brings Special 14 nights sailing across vineyard of Europe - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Azamara Club Cruises brings Special 14 nights sailing across vineyard of Europe Published on : Tuesday, July 14, 2015
Azamara Club Cruises brings all wine lovers. Special 14 nights sailing across delightful havens and vineyard of Europe. Raise a toast to world-class wines and gorgeous landscapes in France, Spain and Portugal when the vineyards are heavy with fruit. Sail the Gironde Estuary—off-limits to big ships—to the heart of Bordeaux, one of the most exquisite of French cities.Get a taste of French Basque country in Saint Jean de Luz ,upscale Biarritz and Bayonne. Visit the Guggenheim Museum in Blibao, sip exquisite ports in Porto , and don’t miss the scenic Dourbo River Valley . In Lisbon, explore cafes and the Old Quarter and enjoy the nightlife in Barcelona.
Package Details:
Ship: Azamara Quest
Sailing Date: 25th August – 8th September , 2015.
Voyage : 14N Delightful Havens & Vineyards of France, Spain & Portugal
Ports of call : Southampton ( England) – St.Peter Port, Guernsey (Channel Islands) – Bordeaux ( France) – Biarritz/ Bayonne( (France ) – Bilbao (Spain)- Leixões, Porto( Portugal) – Lisbon(Portugal) – Gibraltor ( United Kingdom) – Barcelona ( Spain )
Price on request.
PACKAGE INCLUDES: Shipboard accommodations, ocean transportation, most meals, some beverages and most onboard entertainment.
Highlights:-
-3 overnight stays in Bordeaux , Saint Jean de Luz and Barcelona
· -Complimentary Az Amazing Evening : Wine tasting at Chateau Giscours
· -Join on a optional Land Discoveries excursion to St. Émilion, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
*NCCF Govt Fees and Taxes extra. T&C apply
NOTE* Prices are per person, based on double occupancy, indicative, for cruise only on select sailings and stateroom categories.
Government taxes and fees are additional. For new reservations only. Subject to availability. Certain restrictions apply.
Please Note :
Azamara Club Cruises are known for destination immersive experience with Longer Stays , more overnights and Night Touring
-A Boutique cruiseline Azamara’s focuses on Destination Immersion®—which means longer stays, more overnights and night touring on 100% of our luxury cruise voyages
Azamara Club Cruises are an all inclusive vacation experience ( with onboard complimentary amenities )
